resources.string: Take a Breath Focusing on your breathing slows down the adrenaline response and the distressing thoughts. Breathe mindfully and notice the sensations of breathing into your belly. You might find it helpful to count your breaths, or to breath in to a count of 4, and out to a count of 4.
Observe Your thoughts and feelings. For example Im anxious My body alarm system has been triggered My mind is tricking me into believing Im in danger Im feeling really tense and hyped up
